issue.title: [CF 1153] Defensive Cooldowns
issue.body:
I added two buffgroups that handle Single Target and AOE Damagereduce effects:

DefensiveBuffsSingle="155835;22812;102342;61336;48707;48792;48982;19263;153626;157913;113862;45438;122278;122783;115203;115176;31850;498;642;86659;1022;114039;6940;47585;47788;33206;31224;74001;5277;108271;30823;110913;104773;118038;114029;871;23920;114030;",

DefensiveBuffsAOE    = "_51052;_31821;_62618;_76577;_98008;_114028;",

Since I'm playing priest and have both and useable on others, a split between AOE and Single Target effects is really usefull.
It has all spells that either are Immunity or Reduce Damage.


> Posted by CurseForge user G3sch4n | Imported from CurseForge issue #1153 | Raw

comments.body:
Thanks for these - I'll add them in!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
